definitions.definition: To alternate starts with a teammate of opposite handedness , depending on the handedness of the opposing pitcher
examples: Taylor has been hitting poorly against left-handers, and Morgan has been hitting poorly against right-handers, so they will platoon .

definitions.definition: To specialize in a particular position or playing style.
Of self-driving vehicles : to travel in a close convoy , each vehicle communicating electronically with the others.

main_definition: ( baseball ) To alternate starts with a teammate of opposite handedness , depending on the handedness of the opposing pitcher
secondary_definitions: ( sports ) To specialize in a particular position or playing style.
Of self-driving vehicles : to travel in a close convoy , each vehicle communicating electronically with the others.
